name: Dare_Reimagination_02
description:
don't dream

This NFT is part of a new series of coded works, ‘Reimaginations’, that experiment with images from my 1995 interactive animated dynamic collage, DareNotSpeakItsName. 

Composed from my photographs and video, as well as appropriated images, texts, sound, and dialogue from "The Wizard of Oz", gay porn videos, and news articles, DareNotSpeakItsName explored the relationship between mass-media representation, identity, imagination, and viewership as mechanisms of the closet.

GIF, 640 × 480 px · Original artwork by Joe Ferrari
